page.title: 06A BUSINESS IN GORDON
page.content: In the village of Gordon the main employers are farmers and the garages. Most other people have to travel to get to their work. Hunters garage is one of the main employers. altogether they have 16 people and 2 part time employed. The hours they work are 8am to 7pm during the week and 8am to 5pm at the weekend. The garage also has its own breakdown service which is used about 3 times a week. Any mendable vehicle that is brought in will be mended. At the garage new and second hand cars are sold. About 4 new cars a week are sold. Each year about 400 second hand cars are sold too. Mr Hunters favourite part of his job is working in the workshop. the worst part is office work.
